title: A brief introduction to subjects of 3rd sem(CSE)
content:
I have completed my holidays and now returning back to Bangalore.. during holidays i had a look on the subjects only a little bit. i felt 
DDCO is manageable and DSA is a bit tough..but I don't have much idea about the rest..it would be great if any senior could help me

comments.body:
DDCO- watch Reetinder Sidhu AV summary and study slides/textbook and solve problems
SDS- learn on own, solve questions from textbook
DSA- watch AV summaries, study pesu academy notes/slides and solve more and more problems on leetcode/hackerrank.you ll get big af assignments, make sure u do it on your own
AFLL- don't neglate after seeing this subject,although it is easy , it's quite tricky, you need more practice
WT- watch YT videos, study pesu academy notes, do projects, do all assignments on own
Doing all slides and notes is as usual mandatory.

Which are the books/textbooks that can be helpful?

Also is there any special topic subject? I had seen resources for some programming languages like ruby,cpp and unix under special topic in the discord server..Do we still have it?

The '25 batch did not have special topics(22 credits only not 24), i have seen the credit distribution table even the '26 batch does not have special topics.you ll be having summer courses of these topics next year.
